Name: Modernista
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A massive flavour hit to awaken your taste buds.
History: Adapted from a drink created by Ted Haigh (AKA Dr. Cocktail) and derived from the 'Modern Cocktail'. See Ted's book, Vintage Spirits & Foreign Cocktails .
Nutrition: One serving of Modernista contains 262 calories
